title: News24.com | National lockdown: Alexandra ignores call to stay in
description: The suburb was bustling as residents carried on with their lives, with scores of people roaming the streets.
content:
Scores of Alexandra residents are ignoring President Cyril Ramaphosa's call to stay at home.
This after he declared a national state of disaster and ordered the nation to self-isolate for 21 days.
SAPS members and soldiers were patrolling the area on Friday… [+1436 chars]
